forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 4, with temperatures rising to around 6 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -10. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: M.L. King Jr. Day
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely after 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 10. Wind chill values as low as -11. West wind 8 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 8. Wind chill values as low as -11. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 18th and 19th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail was groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 19th, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – These trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Plenty of lake effect , combined with low 20 degree temps, plus the full big groom this morning , makes Nubs Knob red and blue trails as nice as it gets !

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated Bucks Run today mid afternoon. It was a great day. Lightning fast. Red Swix wax!Thank you to the staff. You keep making the best out of whatever nature gives us. Loop is 2.2km.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: They've finally got enough accumulation to make the golf course skiable. Used waxless rock skis and had a very nice time. Skied some in the woods, flats are doable but wouldn't try any hills, not enough snow yet.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 Lifts, Space Worm and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails will be packed this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM. Extra night session Sunday, January 19 from 5:30 to 9:00 PM as well.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold day with a high around 12 degrees predicted. Despite the temperature the wind is light and this is the kind of cold you can dress for and still have a great day on the slopes. The snow surface is in excellent shape. Expect a firm base that has great grip for carving turns. A little fresh snow landed this morning which will further improve the ski conditions. Fresh cold snow can often make skis feel slow, stop by the Tune Center for a quick wax job for those ski and board bases. NASTAR racing is open to the public today from 12:30 to 2:30 PM on Birch Run, please sign-up at the Front Desk. The Tweed Tones will be playing at 3:30 PM in the Nub's Pub. The lifts spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
